_description: Beloved’s mourning for the absence of ‘hanton payell’ — two couplets

PhilRos108329.Transcription:
fayerwell goey and wellcome pagentayell I se hanton payell
                    aeynbey gower on yow wot well whothat euer hayes ben and shall be
                    so
PhilRos108329.Note:
Added by a hand of the sixteenth century to front flyleaf, signed
                    ‘par me h s’.
